text: Ariel Maximiliano Richeze Araquistain (born 7 March 1983) is an Argentine professional cyclist. He rides for UCI WorldTeam . Richeze won the silver medal at the 2015 Pan American Games (Men's Team Pursuit). His brothers Roberto, Mauro and Adri√°n are also cyclists. Richeze was diagnosed with COVID-19 in March 2020.El ciclista argentino Maximiliano Richeze dio positivo de coronavirus ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine cyclists
title: Maximiliano Richeze
